data.message: Hi Coca Cola, are you pushing the uk government to adopt a money back scheme for plastic bottles?

replies.message: Hi Jessica, we’re committed to supporting any well-designed initiative that could improve recovering and recycling rates, including a deposit return scheme (DRS). Ultimately that decision must be led by Government but requiring many organisations, – public and private – to work in partnership. We’ve been working with stakeholders in Scotland to understand the best approach to DRS for some time and want any planned DRS to be well-designed, making sure it has the biggest impact on litter and the lowest impact on your regular household collection.
